subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में क्या मंगलवालों के प्रमोजन है।
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II
explanation_en:
Amber Fort is a famous monument located in Jaipur, built by Maharaja Mansingh I in 1592 AD.

अमेर मंगल एक जयसिंह सूचौंग के बने सेवा मंगल, जन्मदिन 1592 AD लेकिन दोनेवा अमेर मंगल
explanation_hi: जयसिंह सूचौंग के बने सेवा मंगल, जन्मदिन 1592 AD लेकिन दोनेवा अमेर मंगल

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the official language of Rajasthan?
explanation_en:
Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan.

राजस्तान के अन्तर्षित Bhawan

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which dance form is popular in Rajasthan?
explanation_en:
Ghoomar is a popular dance form originated from Rajasthan. It is known for its graceful movements and is performed by women.

राजस्तान के कलाकारित शैल

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Udaipur?
explanation_en: The famous king Rana Kumbha (Rana Kumbha) established the city of Jaipur (Jaipur) and not Uday Singh, who founded Udaipur (Udaipur).
